error.message: Parameter $cck_manager of method Drupal\media_migration\Plugin\migrate\D7FileEntityItemDeriver::__construct() has typehint with deprecated interface Drupal\migrate_drupal\Plugin\MigrateCckFieldPluginManagerInterface. Deprecated in drupal:8.3.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\migrate_drupal\Plugin\MigrateFieldPluginManagerInterface instead.

Class Drupal\media_migration\Plugin\migrate\field\FileEntity extends deprecated class Drupal\Core\Field\Plugin\migrate\field\d7\EntityReference. Deprecated in drupal:8.7.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\field\Plugin\migrate\field\d7\EntityReference instead.

Call to method alterFieldMigration() of deprecated class Drupal\migrate_drupal\Plugin\migrate\field\FieldPluginBase. Deprecated in drupal:8.7.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\field\Plugin\migrate\field\d7\EntityReference instead.

Call to method alterFieldInstanceMigration() of deprecated class Drupal\migrate_drupal\Plugin\migrate\field\FieldPluginBase. Deprecated in drupal:8.7.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\field\Plugin\migrate\field\d7\EntityReference instead.

Call to method alterFieldFormatterMigration() of deprecated class Drupal\migrate_drupal\Plugin\migrate\field\FieldPluginBase. Deprecated in drupal:8.7.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\field\Plugin\migrate\field\d7\EntityReference instead.

Call to method getFieldFormatterMap() of deprecated class Drupal\field\Plugin\migrate\field\d7\EntityReference. Deprecated in drupal:8.7.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\field\Plugin\migrate\field\d7\EntityReference instead.

Class Drupal\media_migration\Plugin\migrate\field\MediaImage extends deprecated class Drupal\Core\Field\Plugin\migrate\field\d7\EntityReference. Deprecated in drupal:8.7.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\field\Plugin\migrate\field\d7\EntityReference instead.

Call to method alterFieldMigration() of deprecated class Drupal\migrate_drupal\Plugin\migrate\field\FieldPluginBase. Deprecated in drupal:8.7.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\field\Plugin\migrate\field\d7\EntityReference instead.

Call to method alterFieldInstanceMigration() of deprecated class Drupal\migrate_drupal\Plugin\migrate\field\FieldPluginBase. Deprecated in drupal:8.7.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\field\Plugin\migrate\field\d7\EntityReference instead.
Add core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 to media_migration.info.yml to designate that the module is compatible with Drupal 9. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3070687.
A drupal/core requirement is not present in composer.json. Having a composer.json is not a requirement for Drupal 9 compatibility but if there is one, it should include a drupal/core requirement.
